Title: The Balkan Line
Writer: Andrey Anaykin, Ivan Naumov, Natalya Nazarova
Actors: Anton Pampushnyy, Milena Radulovic, Yuriy Kutsenko, Ravshana Kurkova
Plot: NATO bombs Belgrad March 1999. June: Serb army pulls out of Kosovo. Some Muslims believe they can now plunder, rape and kill Serbs in Kosovo. 5 Russians are to take Kosovo's airport from such bandits and hold it until peacekeepers arrive.
